summary.span: 包含数据行集合类的扩展方法。

span.span: Contains the extension methods for the data row collection classes.

summary.span: 此 API 支持 .NET Framework 基础结构，但不应在代码中直接使用。

span.span: This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含静态扩展方法的定义方法和标准查询操作和类。The class contains static extension methods that define the method and standard query operations for the and classes. 此类不能被继承，并不能实例化。This class cannot be inherited and cannot be instantiated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 此投影方法要求的转换函数`selector`，以便生成一个值，为源序列中的每个值`source`。This projection method requires the transform function, `selector`, to produce one value for each value in the source sequence, `source`. 如果`selector`返回一个值，本身为一个集合，它负责的使用者手动遍历子序列。If `selector` returns a value that is itself a collection, it is up to the consumer to traverse the subsequences manually.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用操作需要现有主排序操作使用。The use of a operation requires an existing primary sorting operation using . 此方法使用延迟的执行实现。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 最接近的返回值是存储执行操作所需的所有信息的对象。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 直到或者通过调用枚举的对象不执行此方法所表示的查询其`GetEnumerator`方法直接或通过使用`foreach`在 Visual C# 或`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic.
